name: Where is my cheese?
description:
Overview

'Where is My Cheese?' is a top-down shooting game.As a soldier of the mice army, the player is required to avoid enemies approaching from the top of the screen,

and use various items to defeat octopus enemies and finally, The Big Cat Cheesy, who stole all of the cheese from Earth!

Features

• Amazing graphic arts in a 16:9 resolution
  • Various maps with various patterns of enemies
    • • Authentic boss monsters in each stage

    Contact

    rohakun@gmail.com

    BGM Information

    Spin-Dig Galaxy [Super Mario Galaxy 2 music]

    Composer(s): Mahito Yokota, Ryo Nagamatsu and Koji Kondo

    Arranger(s): Mahito Yokota, Ryo Nagamatsu and Koji Kondo

    Developer(s): Nintendo EAD

    Publisher(s): Nintendo
